title: Werkscontroller (m/w/d)
description: Unser Klient ist ein renommiertes, Mitte der 60er Jahre gegrndetes Unternehmen, das auf die Entwicklung und Produktion eines breiten Portfolios von Sensorlsungen und Automatisierungskomponenten spezialisiert ist. Dort dienen sie zur Erfassung von Objekten, zur Messung von Abstnden, zur Positionierung von Maschinen und zur berwachung von Prozessen. Das Unternehmen hat weltweit Niederlassungen und Vertriebspartner, um seine Produkte und Dienstleistungen international anzubieten. Es wird grter Wert auf Innovation gelegt und man investiert kontinuierlich in Forschung und Entwicklung, um den Kunden dauerhaft modernste Technologien und Lsungen anbieten zu knnen  Um das Team zu verstrken haben wir aktuell zu besetzen die Position des  Werkscontroller (m/w/d)AufgabenSie sind fr die Erstellung und Koordination der Budgetplanung sowie der berwachung der Realisierung abgestimmter Plne und Budgets verantwortlich. Dabei bewerten Sie Investitionsplne hinsichtlich ihrer Wirtschaftlichkeit und erarbeiten Empfehlungen, die Sie als Business Partner fr die die Betriebsleitung an das Management weitergeben. Ein weiterer Punkt ist die kontinuierliche berprfung und Anpassung bestehender Controlling-Methoden, -Instrumente, -Prozesse und Systeme sowie die Weiterentwicklung des Projektcontrollings. Zu guter Letzt wirken Sie natrlich aber auch bei Monats- /Jahresabschlssen insbesondere bei der Bestandsbewertung mit und analysieren die Reports aus der Finanzbuchhaltung ber Ergebnisse, Soll-/Ist-Abweichungen und Manahmen.QualifikationUm den Anforderungen der Position gerecht zu werden sollten Sie ein Studium oder eine Weiterbildung mit Schwerpunkt Finanzen und Controlling sowie mehrjhrige Berufserfahrung aus dem Werks- oder Produktionscontrolling mitbringen. Fr die Position sind auerdem auch, um die relevanten Tools und Systeme effektiv nutzen zu knnen gute Kenntnisse in SAP und MS-Office erforderlich.BenefitsVor Ort werden Sie ein sehr angenehmes Betriebsklima vorfinden. Dabei werden Sie von einem sehr umgnglichen Director Controlling empfangen und gezielt und professionell eingearbeitet. description: We are Finanzcheck  the online loan comparison platform and the go-to place for consumer loans in Germany. Become now part of our success story!Our Development teams are distributed along the customer journey, each being completely in charge of their corresponding part of our platform and according services and systems. They operate in a vastly autonomous and self-managed way: we live up to our belief in flat hierarchies and self-organized network structures where leadership happens in a lateral manner and teams are enabled to make their own decisions within our exciting roadmap. This empowers everyone to a great extent - by sharing responsibility and decision-making amongst all colleagues.YOUR NEW TEAMWe are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our Customer Communication team. Our mission is to connect people to enable the best loan application process possible. Meaning we create an innovative omni-channel communication landscape by building services that ensure a meaningful and right-in-time communication with our customers in a fully automated way along the whole customer journey. This includes email, sms and most important: our fully automated dialer for in- and out-bound calls as core service for our loan advisors.WHAT YOU WILL BE DOINGWork in a data-intensive distributed environment with different NodeJS and Typescript services that run on AWS Lambda and Kubernetes as well as React in the frontend.Ensure that all services of our customer communication run with high stability and all traffic is properly managed and tracked.Conceptualize and build new functionality as well as improve existing systems and services.Take active part in the decision-making processes of your team (goals, timelines, stack, etc.).Work closely with our PO to plan and continuously develop new features for the teams domainInvolvement in the development and maintenance of the teams products end to end in line with our you build it, you run it, you own it philosophy which also includes DevOps tasks.YOUR PROFILEYou have several years of professional experience with Node.js and TypeScriptYou have at least initial experience working in DevOps environments (having operational understanding of AWS, Kubernetes, Terraform and Infrastructure-as-Code)Experience with Twilio and other customer data platform providers is a plusYou are passionate about your work and a great communicator, always keen on sharing knowledge with the teamYou are proactive and willing to take over responsibilities, having ownership while working in a highly collaborative environmentYou have worked in agile environments in the past; ideally within startup-like companies with flat hierarchies and cross team collaborationDont meet every single requirement? We are not simply looking for years of experience  we are looking for the right person and are open to both mid-level and senior profiles. If you are excited about this role and meet the essential criteria but your previous experience doesnt align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyway.WHAT WE OFFERAn open and dynamic working environment with a diverse and multicultural team composed of more than 50 nationalities.Internal career programs, further training opportunities & German language coursesFor your relaxation there are 30 days of vacation. Parents benefit from 10 additional child-sick-daysFor your physical and mental health, we offer sponsorships for different sport centers as well as online meditation courses.We support social projects and cover part of the costs of your public transportation ticket so you can travel in an environmentally conscious way!A subsidized company pension planINTERESTED?Then apply online in just 2 minutes via the application button as Fullstack Engineer (f/m/d).
